title: Details text

_items.title: Licensed Aircraft Engineer - Royal Jordanian Airlines ( 2004 - 2010 )
_items.body:
• Supervised a team of mechanics while maintaining aircraft electronic equipment where main electrical and electronic aircraft systems are checked for malfunctions.
  • Identified potential malfunctions and performed suitable corrective action.
  • Developed DierctX/Visual C++ based app to aid in locating aircraft components.
  • Used various electrical equipment and proven techniques to measure and ensure integrity of electrical systems operations.
  • Supervised and mentored junior staff on overall job duties explaining theory and holding on-the-job training sessions.

_items.title: Senior Licensed Aircraft Engineer - Al Jaber Aviation private jets ( 2010 - 2012 )
_items.body:
• Managed maintenance process of aircraft fleet ensuring that any faults are rectified.
  • Planned maintenance in accordance with aircraft flight schedule ensuring maximum efficiency.
  • Performed trouble shooting and fault rectification in case of malfunctions.
  • Developed C# based applications to aid in storing/retrieving maintenance records.

_items.title: Simulation / Instructional Designer - Aggreko UK ( 2012 - 2016 )
_items.body:
• Developed eLearning modules using Storyline2 and HTML.
  • Project managed the development of several training applications ensuring the highest quality product being delivered on time.
  • Made use of leading edge technology (used in the oil and gas industry) to develop simulations and game based learning.
  • Developed Diesel, Gas, and HFO engine simulations and training material.
  • Drafted 3D models of equipment.
  • Developed Android learning apps.

title: My profile
instruction: Click the left or right arrows to learn more
mobileInstruction: Swipe left or right to learn more

_items.title: Aviation Maintenance
_items.body: After graduating as an electronics engineer I started my career in Aircraft Maintenance in 2004. In 2007 I was promoted a Licensed Aircraft Engineer and became a supervisor. In 2010 I started working in the private jets sector.

_items.title: Senior Aircraft Maintenance Engineer
_items.body: In 2010 I started work with a private jets company. After some time I was promoted to Senior Aircraft Maintenance Engineer. During my time in the Aircraft Maintenance field I have developed a few applications that are useful to the maintenance process. I was always interested in the development of technical applications, which lead to my next career move.

_items.title: Simulation / Instructional Design
_items.body: In 2012 I was offered a job in Training. The role was to develop simulations and e Learning modules using a variety of tools. I have been doing that for four years and I have learned a lot during the process. I have used several authoring tools to develop e learning courses. In addition to that I have developed / project managed the development of virtual reality and simulation apps.
